channel.title: Salt Lake City|Salt Lake County|Utah|United States on Roadsign Pictures
channel.description: Recent content in Salt Lake City|Salt Lake County|Utah|United States on Roadsign Pictures

item.title: I-15 South Exits 308 and 307
item.description: I-15 south at Exit 308 - I-80 West/Reno (Nevada)/SLC International Airport. I-15 south approaching Exit 307 - 400 South. Continue on I-15 south to Las Vegas (Nevada). I-80 joins I-15 through downtown Salt Lake City.

item.title: I-80 East - Exit 129
item.description: I-80 East at Exit 129 - UT-186 West/Foothill Drive/Parleys Way

item.title: I-80 East - Exit 129
item.description: I-80 east approaching Exit 129 - Foothill Drive/Parleys Way.

item.title: I-80 East - Exits 127 and 128
item.description: I-80 east at Exit 127 - 2300 East. Approaching Exit 128 - I-215 South/Belt Route. Continue east on I-80 for Cheyenne (Wyoming).

item.title: I-80 East - Ski Areas
item.description: Ski Area directions on I-80 east approaching I-215. Use I-215 South (Exit 128) for Solitude, Brighton, Snowbird, and Alta Ski Areas. Continue east on I-80 for Park City and Deer Valley Ski Areas.

item.title: I-80 East - Exits 127 and 128
item.description: I-80 east approaching Exit 127 - 2300 East. Approaching Exit 128 - I-215 South/Belt Route. Continue east on I-80 for Cheyenne (Wyoming).

item.title: I-80 East - Exit 126 and Approaching Exit 128
item.description: I-80 east at Exit 126 - 1300 East. Approaching Exit 128 - I-215 South/Belt Route.

item.title: I-80 East - Exit 125. Approaching Exit 126
item.description: I-80 east at Exit 125 - UT-71/700 East. Approaching Exit 126 - 1300 East.

item.title: I-80 East - Exit 124
item.description: I-80 east approaching Exit 124 - US-89/State St.

item.title: UT-201 East To I-80 East Separation - Exit 125
item.description: UT-201 East To I-80 East Separation approaching Exit 125 - US-89/State St.

item.title: US-89 North - Salt Lake City
item.description: US-89 North (Beck St.) in Salt Lake City

item.title: I-15 North - Exit 312
item.description: I-15 north at Exit 312 - US-89 North

item.title: I-15 North - Exit 311
item.description: I-15 north approaching Exit 311 - 2300 North.

item.title: 400 South at I-15 North
item.description: 400 South at I-15 North (Exit 307 onramp) in Salt Lake City.

item.title: 400 South at I-15 (Exit 307)
item.description: 400 South at I-15 (Exit 307) in downtown Salt Lake City. Use I-15 North for Ogden. Express lane/HOV entrance for I-15 South.

item.title: I-80 East - Exit 121 and I-15 Junction
item.description: I-80 East at Exit 121 - UT-269 East/600 South. I-80 East (to Cheyenne, WY) joins I-15 South (to Las Vegas, NV) through downtown Salt Lake City.

item.title: I-80 East - Exits 120 and 121
item.description: I-80 east at Exit 120 - I-15 North/Ogden. Approaching Exit 121 - UT-269 East/600 South. I-15 and I-80 join briefly through Salt Lake City. Continue on I-80 East for Cheyenne (Wyoming), and I-15 South for Las Vegas (Nevada).

item.title: I-80 East - Exits 120 and 121
item.description: I-80 east approaching Exit 120 - I-15 North/Ogden. Also approaching Exit 121 - 600 South. Use left lanes for I-80 East and I-15 South. Speed Limit 65 MPH / Truck Speed 55 MPH.

item.title: I-80 East - Exits 120 and 121
item.description: I-80 east approaching Exit 120 - I-15 North/Ogden; approaching Exit 121 - UT-269 East/600 South. Use left lanes for I-15 South and I-80 East.

item.title: I-80 West - Exit 122
item.description: I-80 west at Exit 122 - 2100 S/1300 S/900 S. The interchange in the background is the southern I-80/I-15 interchange in Salt Lake City.

item.title: I-80 West - Exit 126
item.description: I-80 West at Exit 126 - 1300 East.

item.title: I-80 West - Exit 126
item.description: I-80 approaching Exit 126 - 1300 East/Sugar House

item.title: I-80 West - Exits 114 and 113
item.description: I-80 West at Exit 114 - Wright Brothers Drive and approaching Exit 113 - UT-172/5600 West.

item.title: I-80 West - Exits 115B and 115A
item.description: I-80 west at Exit 115B - SLC International Airport. Approaching Exit 115A - Bangerter Highway.

item.title: I-80 West - Exits 115B and 115A
item.description: I-80 west approaching Exit 115B - Airport and Exit 115A - Bangerter Highway.

item.title: UT-201 West - Exit 12
item.description: UT-201 west approaching Exit 12 - UT-172/5600 West.

item.title: UT-201 West - Exits 15A and 14
item.description: UT-201 west at Exit 15A - I-215 South. Approaching Exit 14 - 3200 West.

item.title: I-15 South/I-80 East Ramps at Exit 305A-B
item.description: I-15 South/I-80 East Exit 305 A-C ramps at Exit 305A-B. Use Exit 305B - 2100 South; Exit 305A - UT-201 West/West Valley. Use left lanes for I-80 East/Cheyenne(WY)/I-15 South/Las Vegas(NV).

item.title: I-80 East/I-15 South - Exits 305 A-C
item.description: I-80 East/I-15 South Exits 305 A-C ramps at Exit 305C - 1300 South. Continue on ramp for Exits 305B-A - UT-201 West/2100 S/West Valley.

item.title: End UT-269 at I-15/I-80
item.description: End UT-269 (W 600 S) at I-15/I-80 onramp. Merge right for I-80 West/S.L. Intl. Airport/Reno (NV); merge left for I-15 South/Las Vegas(NV)/I-80 East/Cheyenne(WY).

item.title: UT-186 West at US-89
item.description: UT-186 West (W 400 S) at US-89 (State St.) in Salt Lake City. Turn right to continue west on UT-186; continue straight for north US-89.

item.title: UT-186 West Approaching US-89
item.description: UT-186 West (W 400 S) approaching US-89 (State St.).

item.title: UT-186 West (Foothill Drive) at UT-282
item.description: UT-186 West (Foothill Drive) at UT-282 to University of Utah, Fort Douglas, and the University Childrens Hospital. Continue on Foothill Drive for the Veterans Administration Hospital.

item.title: I-80 West Exit 129 Offramp
item.description: I-80 West Exit 129 offramp at UT-186. Use right lane for UT-186 West/Foothill Rive. Use left lane for West Parleys Way.

item.title: I-80 West - Exit 129
item.description: I-80 West approaching Exit 129 - Foothill Drive/Parleys Way.

item.title: UT-172 South at UT-201 West (Exit 11 Onramp)
item.description: UT-172 South at UT-201 West (Exit 11 Onramp)

item.title: UT-172 South Approaching UT-201
item.description: UT-172 South approaching UT-201. Use UT-201 west to Magna; UT-201 east to Salt Lake.

item.title: South 7200 West at I-80 (Exit 111) Onramp
item.description: South 7200 West at I-80 (Exit 111) Onramp.

item.title: 7200 South at I-80 East
item.description: 7200 South at I-80 East to Salt Lake City.

item.title: I-80 West - Exit 111
item.description: I-80 west approaching Exit 111 - 7200 West.

item.title: I-80 West - Exit 113
item.description: I-80 west at Exit 113 - UT-172/5600 West.

item.title: I-80 West - Exits 114 and 113
item.description: I-80 West at Exit 114 - Wright Brothers Drive and approaching Exit 113 - UT-172/5600 West.

item.title: I-80 West - Salt Lake City
item.description: I-80 West on the western edge of Salt Lake City. The I-80 shield has the Utah state name in it.

item.title: I-80 West - Exit 114
item.description: I-80 west approaching Exit 114 - Wright Brothers Drive.

item.title: I-80 West - Exit 115A
item.description: I-80 West at Exit 115A - Bangerter Highway

item.title: North Temple at I-80 West
item.description: North Temple at I-80 West/Reno. Continue west on North Temple for Salt Lake City Airport.

item.title: I-80 West - Exit 115
item.description: North Temple approaching I-80 West/Reno. Use next left for Bangerter Highway.

item.title: North Temple Approaching I-80 and SLC Airport Interchange
item.description: North Temple Approaching I-80 West/Reno. Continue west on North Temple to Salt Lake City Airport.

item.title: North Temple Approaching I-80
item.description: North Temple approaching I-80 West to Reno in Salt Lake City. Approaching interchange with I-80, Bangerter Highway, and Salt Lake City International Airport.

item.title: US-89 North at I-15 North Onramp to Ogden
item.description: US-89 North at I-15 North Onramp to Ogden. Continue north on US-89 for North Salt Lake. US-89 parallels I-15 north to Brigham City. US-89 briefly joins I-15 between Woods Cross and Farmington.

item.title: US-89 North Approaching I-15 North
item.description: US-89 North Approaching I-15 North to Ogden. Notice the UTAH in the I-15 shield. Utah has been signing all new interstate shields with the state name since around 2014.

item.title: US-89 North at UT-186
item.description: US-89 North at UT-186 (Victory Way) in Salt Lake City.

item.title: US-89 North (400 South) - I-15 North Travel Times
item.description: US-89 North (400 South) in Salt Lake City. Freeway Travel Times to Farmington via Legacy Parkway (via I-80/I-215) or via I-15. This was taken on Saturday morning and there were no times displayed.

item.title: End UT-270 North (West Temple) at US-89 (400 South)
item.description: End UT-270 North (West Temple) at US-89 (400 South). Use 400 South for I-15 north.

item.title: UT-270 North (West Temple) at UT-269 West (500 South)
item.description: UT-270 North (West Temple) at UT-269 West (500 South) in Salt Lake City.

item.title: UT-270 South (West Temple) - To I-80 East/I-15 South
item.description: UT-270 South (West Temple) - To I-80 East/I-15 South in Salt Lake City. These type of signs directing traffic to I-15 and I-80 with the white background are all over downtown Salt Lake City.

item.title: UT-269 East (600 South) at UT-270 (West Temple)
item.description: UT-269 East (600 South) at UT-270 (West Temple) in Salt Lake City.

item.title: UT-201 East - Exits 17 and I-15/I-80 Jct.
item.description: UT-201 East approaching Exit 17 - 900 West. Approaching I-15 South/Las Vegas (NV)/I-80 East/Cheyenne (WY) and I-15 North/Salt Lake/I-80 West/Reno(NV).

item.title: UT-201 East - Exit 15A and 15B
item.description: UT-201 east at Exit 15A - I-215 South. Approaching Exit 15B - I-215 North.

item.title: UT-201 East - Exits 15A and 15B
item.description: UT-201 east approaching Exit 15A - I-215 South and Exit 15B - I-215 North.

item.title: UT-201 East - Exits 14 and 15A-B
item.description: UT-201 East at Exit 14 - 3200 West. Approaching Exit 15A-B - 1-215.

item.title: UT-201 East - Exit 14
item.description: UT-201 east approaching Exit 14 - 3200 West.

item.title: I-15 North - Exit 311
item.description: I-15 north approaching Exit 311 - 2300 North.

item.title: I-15 North/I-80 West - Exits 307 and Exit 308
item.description: I-15 North/I-80 West at Exit 307 (HOV) - 400 South. Approaching Exit 308 - I-80 West/Reno/Salt Lake International Airport. I-15 continues north to Ogden.

item.title: I-80 West - Exits 124 and 125
item.description: I-80 west at Exit 125 - UT-71/700 East. Approaching Exit 124 - US-89/State St.

item.title: I-80 West - Exits 125 and 126
item.description: I-80 West at Exit 126 - 1300 East/Sugar House. Approaching Exit 125 - 700 East.

item.title: I-80 West - Exit 126
item.description: I-80 approaching Exit 126 - 1300 East/Sugar House

item.title: I-80 West - Exit 129
item.description: I-80 West at Exit 129 - UT-186 West/Foothill Drive/Parleys Way.

item.title: I-80 Exit 117 - I-215 Ramps
item.description: I-215/I-80 interchange, from I-80 east. Use left lanes for I-215 north to Ogden; right lanes for I-215 south to Provo.

item.title: I-80 East - Exits 117, 118, and 120
item.description: I-80 east at Exit 117 - I-215/Odgen/Provo. I-215 is the Salt Lake City Belt Route. Approaching Exit 118 - UT-68/Redwood Road, and Exit 120 - I-15.

item.title: I-80 East - Exits 117 and 118
item.description: I-80 east at Exit 117 - I-215/Ogden/Provo. Approaching Exit 118 - UT-68/Redwood Road.

item.title: I-80 East - Exits 115 and Exit 117.
item.description: I-80 east at Exit 115 A-C - Bangerter Highway/SLC International Airport/North Temple. Approaching Exit 117 - I-215/Ogden/Provo. In the I-215 shield is the text UTAH. More and more of these types of shields with the state names are appearing around Utah.

item.title: I-215 North - Exits 26 and 27
item.description: I-215 north at Exit 26 - UT-67/Legacy Parkway. Approaching Exit 27 - UT-68/Redwood Road. Continue north on I-215 for I-15 and Ogden. Trucks are not allowed to use Legacy Parkway.

item.title: I-215 North - Exit 25
item.description: I-215 north at Exit 25 - 2100 North.

item.title: I-215 North - Exit 26
item.description: I-215 north approaching Exit 26 - UT-67/Legacy Parkway. Continue north on I-215 for I-15 and Ogden.

item.title: I-215 North - Exit 23
item.description: I-215 north at Exit 23 - 7th North.

item.title: I-215 North Approaching I-80
item.description: I-215 north approaching Exit 22 - I-80/Reno (NV)/Cheyenne (WY).

item.title: I-215 North - Exits 21 and 22
item.description: I-215 north at Exit 21 - California Ave. Approaching Exit 22 - I-80/Reno(NV)/Cheyenne(WY).

item.title: I-215 North - Exits 20A and 20B
item.description: I-215 north at Exit 20A - UT-201 East. Approaching Exit 20B - UT-201 West - Magna.

item.title: I-215 South - Exits 20B and 20A
item.description: I-215 south at Exit 20B - UT-201 West/Magna; approaching Exit 20A - UT-201 East.

item.title: I-215 South - Exits 21, 20B, 20A
item.description: I-215 South at Exit 21 - California Ave. Approaching Exit 20B - UT-201 West, and Exit 20A - UT-201 East.

item.title: I-215 South - Exits 22B and 22A
item.description: I-215 south approaching Exit 22B - I-80 West/Airport/Reno. Approaching Exit 22A - I-80 East/Cheyenne (Wyoming).

item.title: I-215 South - Salt Lake City International Airport Exits
item.description: Salt Lake City International Airport exits on I-215 south. For General Aviation, use Exit 23. For Salt Lake City International Airport , use Exit 22B. For the Utah State Fairpark use Exit 23.

item.title: I-215 South - Exit 25
item.description: I-215 south at Exit 25 - 2100 North.

item.title: I-80 East - Exit 129
item.description: I-80 east at Exit 129 - UT-186 West/Foothill Drive/Parleys Way.

item.title: I-80 East At Exit 128 and Approaching Exit 129
item.description: I-80 east at Exit 128 - I-215 South/Belt Route. Approaching Exit 129 - Foothill Drive/Parleys Way. I-80 continues east towards Cheyenne.

item.title: I-80 East - Ski Areas
item.description: I-80 east approaching Exit 118 - I-215 South/Belt Route. A sign informs which exit to take for local ski areas. Use I-215 south for Cottonwood Canyons. Continue on I-80 east towards Cheyenne for Park City.

item.title: I-80 East - Exit 127
item.description: I-80 east at Exit 127 - 2300 East/Holladay.

item.title: I-80 East - Exit 126 and Approaching Exit 128
item.description: I-80 east at Exit 126 - 1300 East. Approaching Exit 128 - I-215 South/Belt Route.

item.title: I-80 East - Exit 125. Approaching Exit 126
item.description: I-80 east at Exit 125 - UT-71/700 East. Approaching Exit 126 - 1300 East.

item.title: I-80 East - Exit 121
item.description: I-80 east at Exit 121 - 600 South. This exit is located on the merge between I-15 South and I-80 East. Use I-80 East for Cheyenne, and I-15 South for Las Vegas.

item.title: I-80 East - Exits 120 and 121
item.description: I-80 east at Exit 120 - I-15 North/Ogden. Approaching Exit 121 - 600 South. I-15 and I-80 join briefly through Salt Lake City. Continue on I-80 East for Cheyenne, and I-15 South for Las Vegas.

item.title: I-80 East - Exits 120 and 121
item.description: I-80 east approaching Exit 120 - I-15 North/Ogden. Also approaching Exit 121 - 600 South. Use left lanes for I-80 East and I-15 South.

item.title: I-80 East - Exit 118
item.description: I-80 east at Exit 118 - UT-68/Redwood Road.

item.title: I-80 East - Exit 117. Approaching Exits 118 and 120
item.description: I-80 east at Exit 117 - I-215/Odgen/Provo. I-215 is the Salt Lake City Belt Route. Approaching Exit 118 - UT-68/Redwood Road, and Exit 120 - I-15.

item.title: I-80 East - Exit 115
item.description: I-80 east at Exit 115 - Bangerter Highway/Airport/North Temple. Use Exit 115 for the Salt Lake City International Airport.

item.title: I-80 East - Exits 115 and Exit 117.
item.description: I-80 east at Exit 115 - Bangerter Highway/Airport/North Temple. Approaching Exit 117 - I-215/Ogden/Provo.

item.title: I-80 East - Exit 113
item.description: I-80 east approaching Exit 113 - 5600 West.

item.title: I-80 East - Exit 111
item.description: I-80 east approaching Exit 111 - 7200 West.

item.description: I-15 north at Exit 312 - US-89 North.

item.description: I-15 north at Exit 311 - 2300 North. Approaching Exit 312 - US-89 North.

item.title: I-15 North - Exit 309
item.description: I-15 north at Exit 309 - 600 North.

item.title: I-15 North/I-80 West - Exits 307 and Exit 308
item.description: I-15 North/I-80 West at Exit 307 (HOV) - 400 South. Approaching Exit 308 - I-80 West/Reno/Salt Lake International Airport. I-15 continues north to Ogden.

item.title: I-15 North - Exits 306, 307 and Exit 308
item.description: I-15 North/I-80 West approaching Exit 306 - 600 South. Approaching Exit 307 (HOV) - 400 South. Approaching Exit 308 - I-80 West/Reno/Salt Lake International Airport.

item.title: I-15 North/I-80 West - Exit 306 and Exit 308
item.description: I-15 North/I-80 West approaching Exits 306 and 308. Exit 306 - 600 South. Exit 308 - I-80 West/Reno.

item.description: I-15 south approaching Exit 307 - I-80 East/Cheyenne. I-15 South/Las Vegas overhead.

item.description: I-15 south at Exit 311 - I-80 West/Reno/S.L. International Airport. I-15 south approaching Exit 310 - 400 South. I-80 South/Las Vegas/I-80 East/Cheyenne overhead.

item.title: I-80 East Exits 124, 125, and 126
item.description: I-80 East, Exits 124,125, and 126. Exit 124 - US-89/State St., Exit 125 - UT-71/700 East, Exit 126 - UT-181/1300 East
